org.nmdp.ngs.reads.quality

Class RealDistributionQualityStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nmdp.ngs.reads.quality.RealDistributionQualityStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QualityStrategy

    public final class RealDistributionQualityStrategy
extends Object
implements QualityStrategy
    Quality strategy which samples from a single real distribution for the entire length of a read.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Create a new real distribution quality strategy.
